name: Battlefield Mission
description:
Storm of war is coming! Battlefield Mission is a 3D modern military combat game. Innovative play way with RPG & SLG style, dedicated graphics and realistic military equipment, magnificent scenes. Do you dare to challenge the invasion and provocation of terrorists?
Features:
●3D High-definition, stunning graphics
Developed with Unity3D, stunning graphics to be first-rate.
●Troop system, strategy lineup
Tank, Chariot, Special Chariot and Artillery, 3D animated battles to experience the most real and strategy war.
●Powerful heroes, innovative play way
Dozens of heroes, multilingual voice over, with unique skills and characters help you to complete the instance and experience the SLG combat.
●League War, clash in war
Join League, extend territory on the vast map with allies, clash with enemies to dominate the world.
A whole new of 3D mordern war is launched. When the disaster continues and faces the unknown war and terrorists, you will find that guard the territory is your Mission!
Contact us:service@mail.ace-hand.com
